parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear subframe can cause the differential to drop, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially catastrophic consequences.
symptoms: Rattling noise from the back of the vehicle
and separation of the trunk floorboards from the car.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear subframe welds can cause the subframe to tear off, leading to a loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries.
symptoms: The welds holding the subframe on are failing
the bracket holding the rear differential is splitting
the vehicle has uneven tire wear
the vehicle has reduced handling and stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash can increase the risk of injury or fatality to occupants, particularly in high-impact collisions.
symptoms: Airbags do not deploy in a crash
even when the vehicle is involved in a severe impact

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The deactivation of airbags can increase the risk of injury or fatality to occupants, particularly children, in the event of a crash.
symptoms: Request to disconnect or deactivate airbags
potentially due to concerns about airbag deployment and child safety.
